text: Carl William Demarest (February 27, 1892 â€“ December 28, 1983) was an American character actor. He is best known for playing Uncle Charley in My Three Sons.Obituary Variety, January 4, 1984. He was born in Saint Paul, Minnesota. Demarest died from prostate cancer and pneumonia in Palm Springs, California, aged 91. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Infectious disease deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Minnesota
title: William Demarest
